title: Royal Decree - Year 47 BCE
restored: Julius Caesar has arrived in Alexandria. The civil war with my brother Ptolemy threatens my throne. But I am no ordinary queen - I am descended from the Ptolemies, from Alexander's general. I will use every weapon at my disposal: my intellect, my charm, my political acumen. Caesar will be my ally, and together we will secure Egypt's future.

title: Love Letter Fragment - Mark Antony
content: ### PAPYRUS DEGRADED ### ...my heart... Rome and Egypt...
restored: My dearest Antony, the Nile flows with the same passion that burns between us. Rome may call you, but Egypt - and I - hold your heart. Together we are unstoppable. Let Octavian scheme in the Senate; we have the wealth of the East and the power of love itself. Our union will create an empire that spans from the Mediterranean to the edges of the known world.

title: Final Testament
content: ### NEARLY LOST ### ...the asp... dignity... never surrender...
restored: They will not parade me through Rome in chains. I am Cleopatra VII Philopator, Queen of Egypt, and I will die as I lived - on my own terms. The asp's bite is swift, they say. Better a queen's death by her own hand than a captive's humiliation. Let history remember: Egypt's last pharaoh chose dignity over defeat.
